title.narrative: World Small Hydropower Development Report 2019 and the knowledge platform www.smallhydroworld.org

description.narrative: UNIDO, together with the International Centre on Small Hydro Power (ICSHP) of the Ministry of Water Resources, China, have successfully launched the World Small Hydropower Development Report 2013 and subsequently the World Small Hydropower Development Report 2016 as well as the knowledge platform www.smallhydroworld.org. UNIDO and ICSHP as the small hydropower (SHP) knowledge leaders of this flagship Report are proposing to continue this partnership for the third edition: World Small Hydropower Development Report 2019 (WSHPDR 2019), as well as providing assistance to maintain, expand and promote the said Report and Knowledge Platform. The content of the Report contains regional overviews and country-level chapters on SHP capacity, potential, legislation and barriers to development. The WSHPDR 2019 contains over an impressive of 20 regional and 165 country chapters. These laborious and arduous research and editorial efforts have been made possible thanks to over 60 voluntary cost-free SHP experts and institutions that have contributed since 2011.
